chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: The ContextMenu plugin allows you to change text area context menu for each mode. You can add there any from jEdit's built-in commands, commands of any plugin and macros. Selected actions can be also shown in jEdit's menu bar under menu, for which you can choose label.
